name: Top 10 Scariest Things Caught on Stream
name_original: Top 10 Scariest Things Caught on Stream
description:
Top Ten Scariest Things Caught On Stream is an asymmetrical multiplayer game where a streamer hunts for a chat-controlled creature in CCTV footage.

Roadmap

  • Better character placement randomization
  • Voice acting
  • More chat commands
  • Local Multiplayer
  • custom non stock asset props
